data.text: @LauraMiers @NickytaLeb This! There are sophisticated tools to automate this crap too. A horrific but highly informative read about one such tool: https://t.co/dKKKhhKX0A

@LauraMiers @NickytaLeb chaos agents & fake accounts ---just one of the tools in their toolbox of mind control. Comparing elephants to ants and using BOLD type false numbers is another. 
In vax they use ALL vax population, in unvax they used ONLY the death count to fabricate their lie. https://t.co/ZHbaz7oE39
@NickytaLeb Yups. I said this before. I also did know there was a lockdown in 2022? I must've missed it. 😶Darn. https://t.co/YLCx5cwEtf
@LauraMiers @NickytaLeb thats true as we clearly can just see in the russian media

@NickytaLeb There’s no shortage of chaos agents & fake accounts to assist with the public opinion shift using repetition. When people see it over & over again, they start to believe it’s representative of their neighbors’ opinions instead of coordinated attempts to manufacture consent.
